name: Baby Manor
description:
Free puzzle games? Life simulation games? Come and play "Baby Manor" developed by MagicSeven for over 2 years. You can enjoy our fun and addictive match-3 puzzle game while renovating your home and dressing up your baby with all kinds of costumes at the same time!

Show us your talent in decorating houses and raising baby! Ready to dive in this amazing experience?

***Features***
-Collect multiple cute costumes for dressing up the baby!
-DECORATE the entire manor including a baby room, a living room, and even gardens!
-Enjoy the delightful storyline!
-BLAST through levels with exciting power-ups and explosive benefits in your spare time! -SHARE and interact with your FB friends about different character's story in game!

Playing this game would give you all the fun you could ever have in the world! What are you waiting for? Come and join us!


***What's more***
A novice daddy called "Bobby" took his wife Sarah and their baby back to the old house left by his great grandmother. Unexpected and exciting journey is about to start.
Help Bobby renovate and decorate his warm and cozy home!
Help Bobby take care of his baby!
Help Bobby impress his father-in-law!
Will he become a qualified daddy? Let's find out.

By the way, levels range from easy to hard for all of you to enjoy – accessible on-the-go, offline and online.

Enjoying Baby Manor? Follow us to get news and updates.
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BabyManorHomepage/
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVvkHk6MRxUcmG1QOGrMnrA

Questions? Contact us by sending an email to babymanor@hotmail.com.
